name: FOTOGRAF: 1-3 episodes
description:
FOTOGRAF is a pixel indie game.

By chance, an ordinary order turns into a trap for two brothers-photographers, Darvi and Darn. Now they are being hunted by a strange group of people trying to kill them. So the hunt for hunters began...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This time, the dangerous and no less ambitious Zizi gets in the way of the heroes with her "rinkwein" [Redhead Anger]. Will you be able to get out of the flames?!
